title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 448.10 - Approved respite care and services provider
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 448.10 - Approved respite care and services provider

State Regulations

Group homes may be approved as approved respite care and
services providers pursuant to Part 435 of this Title and when so approved are
subject to all applicable requirements of such Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
448.10

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
